head: ADVICE #118
body: There is one person and one person alone over whom you have control in this life—and that is yourself.

head: ADVICE #119
body: The way someone treats you is a reflection of how they feel about themselves.

head: ADVICE #120
body: Life is all about managing expectations—most of all your own.

head: ADVICE #121
body: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.

head: ADVICE #124
body: Just keep going. No matter what.

head: ADVICE #126
body: Whenever and wherever possible, we should do what scares us instead of backing away from it.

head: ADVICE #128
body: Release the idea that things could've been any other way.

head: ADVICE #129
body: Be patient and persistent. Life is not so much what you accomplish as what you overcome.

head: ADVICE #130
body: A narrow focus brings big results.
